title: Ewer And Stopper, "Folk Motifs", 1960–70
markings: Marks: On underside: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular body on tall, flared foot, long flaring neck, two loop handles, spout in the form of a bird's head; painted in bright orange, green, and gilding with folk motifs. Lid sits inside neck, has gilded ball finial.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ewer And Stopper, "Folk Motifs", 1960–70.
1960–70. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-101-a,b.
